DOC.brief_summary: This trial compare efficacy safety ruxolitinib Best Available Therapy ( BAT ) patient polycythemia vera ( PV ) hyroxyurea ( HU ) resistant intolerant palpable spleen .
DOC.brief_title: Ruxolitinib Efficacy Safety Patients With HU Resistant Intolerant Polycythemia Vera v Best Available Therapy .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis PV accord 2008 World Health Organization criterion , Nonpalpable spleen , Phlebotomy dependent , Resistant intolerant hydroxyurea , ECOG performance status 0 , 1 2 . Inadequate liver renal function , Significant bacterial , fungal , parasitic , viral infection require treatment , Active malignancy within past 5 year , exclude specific skin cancer , Previously receive treatment JAK inhibitor , Being treat investigational agent , Women pregnant nursing . Other inclusion/exclusion criterion apply .
